Class Student

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Student
public class Student extends User
- Y1–Y2 eligible for BASIC only; Y3–Y4 eligible for BASIC/INTERMEDIATE/ADVANCED. - Max 3 active applications (PENDING or SUCCESSFUL but not yet accepted). - Exactly one confirmed placement per student.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_ACTIVE_APPLICATIONS

      public static final int MAX_ACTIVE_APPLICATIONS
      Maximum number of active applications allowed per student.

      Active applications are those with PENDING or SUCCESSFUL (unaccepted) status. This cap prevents students from overwhelming the system with excessive applications.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String userId, String name, String major, int yearOfStudy, String email)
      Constructs a new Student with the specified details.

      Creates a student user with academic information required for determining internship eligibility and managing applications.

      Parameters:
      userId - unique student identifier (format: UXXXXXXXY where X is digit, Y is letter)
      name - full name of the student
      major - the student's major/field of study (e.g., "CSC", "EEE")
      yearOfStudy - current year of study (1-4)
      email - student's email address for communication

  • Method Details

      public String getMajor()
      Returns the student's major or field of study.
      Returns:
      the major as a String (eg. "EEE", "MAE")

    • isEligibleFor

      public boolean isEligibleFor(InternshipLevel level)
      Determine if the student is eligible for a given internship level.
      Parameters:
      level - the internship level to check
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise

    • filterEligibleVisibleOpen

      public List<Internship> filterEligibleVisibleOpen(List<Internship> all)
      Filter a list of internships to those the student is eligible for, that are currently open for applications and visible.
      Parameters:
      all - list of internships to filter
      Returns:
      list of eligible, visible, open internships

      public boolean hasConfirmedPlacement(Student.AppReadPort apps)
      check if the student has a confirmed internship placement.
      Parameters:
      apps - application read port
      Returns:
      true if a confirmed placement exists, false otherwise

      public int activeApplicationsCount(Student.AppReadPort apps)

      Returns:

    • canStartAnotherApplication

      public boolean canStartAnotherApplication(Student.AppReadPort apps)
      Determine if the student can start another application based on active application count.
      Parameters:
      apps - application read port
      Returns:
      true if another application can be started, false otherwise

    • assertCanApply

      public void assertCanApply(Internship internship, Student.AppReadPort apps)
      Validate that student can apply for specified internship.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to apply for
      apps - application read port
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if any application condition is not met
      NullPointerException - if internship or apps is null

    • assertCanConfirmOffer

      public void assertCanConfirmOffer(Student.AppReadPort apps)
      Validate that student can confirm an internship offer.
      Parameters:
      apps - application read port
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a placement is already confirmed
